attributes.action: ensure that Doctors, if unwilling themselves, refer women to other Doctors in matters of abortion and contraceptive services.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If a Doctor has religious or moral objections they should not be allowed to use these objections to deny women access to a service that they wish to use. They know that matters like this may arise in their profession and if they felt unable to perform their job fully they should not have become Doctors. Pharmacists should also not be allowed to deny women the right to buy the morning-after pill.
